EmailTemplate.name: 2016Q3.Global.NUR.1739.Airscale.Email 3 - AirScale Kai Video
EmailTemplate.subject: Get ready to deliver the radio access performance of tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink:default=View Online}}]]>
Make your radio network 5G-ready Changing the way networks are built AirScale Radio Access Video
Unleash your 5G business potential With unrestricted capacity and limitless connectivity, the next generation radio network will meet all your customers' needs, whether they use mobile broadband or connect machines. Watch the video <[[http://resources.alcatel-lucent.com/asset/200030]]> Webinar
Be ready for the new wave of radio access There's a better way to build radio access networks; one that delivers unlimited capacity, lowest latency, context-relevant services and rapid innovation. AirScale Radio Access has the flexibility to meet all your growth goals. Watch the webinar <[[https://na-sjl.marketo.com/lp/nokia2/1554.Discover_a_new_way_to_build_networks_with_next_generation_radio.html]]> Â©2016 Nokia.
